question: [File: aptos-core/third_party/move/move-vm/runtime/src/frame.rs] [Function: constant_at()] [Constant Type Confusion] Can an attacker reference a constant with an index that resolves to a different type than expected, causing type confusion when the constant is used in subsequent bytecode instructions?
